title: Kisan Call Centre (KCC) - Transcripts of farmers queries & answers
desc: Kisan Call Centre (KCC) - Transcripts of farmers queries & answers
org: Ministry of Agriculture and Farmers Welfare

records.QueryText: how to control black spotting on tomato ?
records.KccAns: spray with mencozeb or propineb @ 3 gm per litre of water
Recommended to spray Quizalofop ethyl 5% EC(Targa Super) 2ml per litre of water on 30 day of sowing to control weeds in Cotton

records.QueryText: Information regarding for control of whitefly in cotton?
records.KccAns: Spray to POLO @200 gm in 150 liter of water / acre . Or spray to oberon @ 200 ml + 100 gm pride + 300 ml nimbisidin in 150 liter of water / acre .
recommended for contact to manidharma bio product, chennai

records.QueryText: INFORMATION REGARDING FOR THE CONTROL OF BROWN LEAF SPOT DISEASE ATTACK ON PADDY(JHONA) CROP?
records.KccAns: FOR THE CONTROL OF BROWN LEAF SPOT DISEASE ATTACK ON PADDY(JHONA) CROP,PLS SPRAY FOLICURE 25EC(TEBUCONAZOLE) OR 200ML TILT 25EC(PROPICONAZOLE) MIXED WITH 200 LITRE OF WATER PER ACRE.

records.QueryText: Information regarding for foot root in rice ?
records.KccAns: APPLY roko(thiofant mithile) biostate comanpy 500gm/acre
Cloudy Weather,  Possibility of Rain.

records.QueryText: CONTROL OF LEAF FOLDER IN PADDY?
records.KccAns: FOR CONTROL OF LEAF FOLDER IN PADDY SPRAY 20 ML FAME OR 350ML TRIAZOPHOS IN 100LT WATER/ACRE.

Recommended for spray malathion 2ml+neem oil 3ml+teepol 1ml/lit of water

records.QueryText: INFORMATION REGARDING SPRAY AT FRUIT DEVELOPMENT 4 IN APPLE
records.KccAns:
when leaf spotting incidence is more than 20%
12-18 days after VIII spray
Hexaconazole 5EC (50 ml) or
Myclobutanill 10W P (50 g) or
Bitertanol 25WP (50 g) or
Fenarimol 12 EC (40 ml) or
Captan 75WP + Hexaconazole 5WP (50 g) or
Metiram 55%+ Pyraclostrobin 5% 60WG (100 g) or
Pyraclostrobin 4% + Dithianon 12% 16 WG (125 g)
